CustomField.formula: TEXT(TODAY() - LodgementDate__c )+ ' days since lodged' + IF(TODAY() - LodgementDate__c>80, IMAGE("https://comparethemarket--partial.sandbox.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681m000000U94H&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1m000001Rsz1","warining", 15,15), '')
CustomField.label: Days Since Created
